p: Recently, due to the extreme negative cardiovascular and gastrointestinal effects of non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drugs (NSAIDs) and selective COX-2 inhibitors, researchers are looking for more potential anti-inflammatory agents with fewer adverse effects than NSAIDs [ 17].
